post.text: Today, I unveiled my 100-day plan -- a plan that will create jobs and a stronger economy, a plan with a solid strategy to finally defeat and end ISIS, a plan that paves the way for a greater America -- an America that WINS again. Believe me, as President I will do more in 100 days than Hillary could in a lifetime -- she's had 30 years and done NOTHING. #ImWithYou! #DrainTheSwamp

comment.author: Kayla
comment.text: Charles-Trey Ray Cotton III! Trump wants to throw all Gays off of Bridges...

replies.author: Kaylie
replies.text: Based on pure astrology who will actually win this presidential election? To find out go to YouTube and put Kaylie on it. Then you'll see an amazing future prediction about who will be the next US president.
